# Flip Ink

> Card flipping profit tracker for Pokemon & Sports card collectors

Flip Ink is a free profit tracker for card flippers. Log purchases, sales, and fees to see true ROI on every card flip. Built for Pokemon & Sports card resellers.

## Features
- Profit dashboard with win rate and ROI
- Auto fee calculator (eBay, TCGPlayer, PayPal, Stripe, shipping)
- Trend analysis by card type and category
- Inventory tracker for unsold holdings
- Mobile-first for use at card shows
- Tax export (CSV) for Pro users

## Pricing
- Free: 50 flips/month, basic dashboard
- Pro ($9/mo): Unlimited flips, advanced analytics, tax export

## Status
Currently in waitlist phase. Join at https://flip.ink

## Links
- Website: https://flip.ink
- Live Marketplace: https://sell.party
- Price Comparison: https://sell.singles
- Courses: https://flip.courses
